dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2379 IH: Farmers’ Market Expansion Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moore of Alabama (for himself and Mr. Vasquez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to include the provision of tree nuts (including shelled tree nuts) under the seniors farmers’ market nutrition program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farmers’ Market Expansion Act of 2025.
Section 4402(b)(1) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 (7 U.S.C. 3007(b)(1)) is amended by striking and herbs and inserting herbs, and tree nuts (including shelled tree nuts).
